verses.verse: In the third <S%H7969><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Cyrus <S%H3566><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Persia <S%H6539><s%> a thing <S%H1697><s%> was revealed <S%H1540><s%> unto Daniel <S%H1840><s%>, whose name <S%H8034><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> Belteshazzar <S%H1095><s%>; and the thing <S%H1697><s%> was true <S%H571><s%>, even a great <S%H1419><s%> warfare <S%H6635><s%>: and he understood <S%H995><s%> the thing <S%H1697><s%>, and had understanding <S%H998><s%> of the vision <S%H4758><s%>.
In those days <S%H3117><s%> I <S%H1840><s%>, Daniel, was mourning <S%H56><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> whole <S%H3117><s%> weeks <S%H7620><s%>.

I ate <S%H398><s%> no pleasant <S%H2532><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%>, neither came <S%H935><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> nor wine <S%H3196><s%> into my mouth <S%H6310><s%>, neither did I anoint <S%H5480><s%> myself at all <S%H5480><s%>, till three <S%H7969><s%> whole <S%H3117><s%> weeks <S%H7620><s%> were fulfilled <S%H4390><s%>.

And in the four <S%H702><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, as I was by the side <S%H3027><s%> of the great <S%H1419><s%> river <S%H5104><s%>, which is Hiddekel <S%H2313><s%>,

I lifted up <S%H5375><s%> mine eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and looked <S%H7200><s%>, and <S%H259><s%>, behold, a man <S%H376><s%> clothed <S%H3847><s%> in linen <S%H906><s%>, whose loins <S%H4975><s%> were girded <S%H2296><s%> with pure gold <S%H3800><s%> of Uphaz <S%H210><s%>:

his body <S%H1472><s%> also was like the beryl <S%H8658><s%>, and his face <S%H6440><s%> as the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of lightning <S%H1300><s%>, and his eyes <S%H5869><s%> as flaming <S%H784><s%> torches <S%H3940><s%>, and his arms <S%H2220><s%> and his feet <S%H4772><s%> like <S%H5869><s%> unto burnished <S%H7044><s%> brass <S%H5178><s%>, and the voice <S%H6963><s%> of his words <S%H1697><s%> like the voice <S%H6963><s%> of a multitude <S%H1995><s%>.

And I <S%H1840><s%>, Daniel, alone saw <S%H7200><s%> the vision <S%H4759><s%>; for the men <S%H582><s%> that were with me saw <S%H7200><s%> not the vision <S%H4759><s%>; but <S%H61><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> quaking <S%H2731><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> upon them <S%H1272><s%>, and they fled to hide themselves <S%H2244><s%>.

So I was left alone <S%H7604><s%>, and saw <S%H7200><s%> this great <S%H1419><s%> vision <S%H4759><s%>, and there remained <S%H7604><s%> no strength <S%H3581><s%> in me <S%H1935><s%>; for my comeliness was turned <S%H2015><s%> in me into corruption <S%H4889><s%>, and I retained <S%H6113><s%> no strength <S%H3581><s%>.

Yet heard <S%H8085><s%> I the voice <S%H6963><s%> of his words <S%H1697><s%>; and when I heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of his words <S%H1697><s%>, then was I fallen into a deep sleep <S%H7290><s%> on my face <S%H6440><s%>, with my face <S%H6440><s%> toward the ground <S%H776><s%>.
And <S%H3027><s%>, behold, a hand touched <S%H5060><s%> me <S%H5128><s%>, which set me upon my knees <S%H1290><s%> and upon the palms <S%H3709><s%> of my hands <S%H3027><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H1840><s%>, O Daniel, thou man <S%H376><s%> greatly beloved <S%H2532><s%>, understand <S%H995><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> that I speak <S%H1696><s%> unto thee <S%H5975><s%>, and stand upright <S%H5977><s%>; for unto thee am I now sent <S%H7971><s%>. And when he had spoken <S%H1696><s%> this word <S%H1697><s%> unto me <S%H5975><s%>, I stood trembling <S%H7460><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> he unto me <S%H3372><s%>, Fear not <S%H1840><s%>, Daniel; for from the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> that thou didst set <S%H5414><s%> thy heart <S%H3820><s%> to understand <S%H995><s%>, and to humble <S%H6031><s%> thyself before <S%H6440><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, thy words <S%H1697><s%> were heard <S%H8085><s%>: and I am come <S%H935><s%> for thy words <S%H1697><s%>' sake.

But the prince <S%H8269><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4438><s%> of Persia <S%H6539><s%> withstood <S%H5975><s%> me one <S%H259><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>; but <S%H4317><s%>, lo, Michael, one <S%H259><s%> of the chief <S%H7223><s%> princes <S%H8269><s%>, came <S%H935><s%> to help <S%H5826><s%> me <S%H3498><s%>: and I remained there with <S%H681><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Persia <S%H6539><s%>.

Now I am come <S%H935><s%> to make thee understand <S%H995><s%> what shall befall <S%H7136><s%> thy people <S%H5971><s%> in the latter <S%H319><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>; for the vision <S%H2377><s%> is yet for many days <S%H3117><s%>:
and when he had spoken <S%H1696><s%> unto me according to these words <S%H1697><s%>, I set <S%H5414><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> toward the ground <S%H776><s%>, and was dumb <S%H481><s%>.

And <S%H1823><s%>, behold, one in the likeness of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> touched <S%H5060><s%> my lips <S%H8193><s%>: then I opened <S%H6605><s%> my mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and spake <S%H1696><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto him that stood <S%H5975><s%> before me <S%H113><s%>, O my lord, by reason of the vision <S%H4759><s%> my sorrows <S%H6735><s%> are turned <S%H2015><s%> upon me <S%H6113><s%>, and I retain no strength <S%H3581><s%>.

For how <S%H1963><s%> can <S%H3201><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of this my lord <S%H113><s%> talk <S%H1696><s%> with this my lord <S%H113><s%>? for as for me <S%H6258><s%>, straightway there remained <S%H5975><s%> no strength <S%H3581><s%> in me <S%H5397><s%>, neither was there breath left in me <S%H7604><s%>.
Then there touched <S%H5060><s%> me again <S%H3254><s%> one like the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%>, and he strengthened me <S%H2388><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, O man <S%H376><s%> greatly beloved <S%H2532><s%>, fear <S%H3372><s%> not <S%H7965><s%>: peace be unto thee <S%H2388><s%>, be strong, yea <S%H2388><s%>, be strong. And when he spake <S%H1696><s%> unto me <S%H2388><s%>, I was strengthened, and said <S%H559><s%>, Let my lord <S%H113><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%>; for thou hast strengthened me <S%H2388><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> he <S%H3045><s%>, Knowest thou wherefore I am come <S%H935><s%> unto thee <S%H7725><s%>? and now will I return to fight <S%H3898><s%> with the prince <S%H8269><s%> of Persia <S%H6539><s%>: and when I go forth <S%H3318><s%>, lo <S%H8269><s%>, the prince of Greece <S%H3120><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%>.

But <S%H61><s%> I will tell <S%H5046><s%> thee that which is inscribed <S%H7559><s%> in the writing <S%H3791><s%> of truth <S%H571><s%>: and there is none <S%H259><s%> that holdeth <S%H2388><s%> with me against these <S%H4317><s%>, but Michael your prince <S%H8269><s%>.
